CoinLesson:
So you want to learn how to hypnotize the other villagers?$n#$b#
		Well, I can certainly help you with that.$u#$b#
		The backbone to any hypnotic session is the trance.$n#$b#
		Use your tool once first to make sure your subject is nice and deeply relaxed, making them suggestible to your words.$n#$b#
		Then, once they are under trance, use your tool again to implant your suggestion.$n#$b#
		Be careful though. Not all suggestions will stick easily if you try to use them right away.$n#$b#
		Your subject has to trust you before they’ll accept your suggestion as truth.$n#$b#
		The more you put a subject under trance, the more they’ll trust you.$n#$b#
		But, giving them too many commands, or letting them go a long time without being entranced, will cause that trust to fade.$n#$b#
		There are some items that can be gifted to help with that, though.$n#$b#
		Some items, like the mesmerizing flowers you've purchased, will make your subjects more trusting. Others may make that trust fade slower.$n#$b#
		Check out my shop to see everything we have!$h#$b#
		But none of that matters if you can't word your suggestions correctly. When you're ready, I'm more than happy to teach you how.$n#$b#
		For a small price, that is!$u#$b#
		Some suggestions are harder to master than others, though, so make sure you practice enough to be able to handle them before I'll be able to teach them to you.$n#
LoversLesson:
Ah, the classic love spell!$l#$b#
		Although, unfortunately, it seems to only work on unmarried villagers who already have a sort-of predisposition towards falling for you.$s#$b#
		I don’t quite understand it myself. If you have a problem with it, bring it up with a monkey worried enough to care.$n#$b#
		Anyways... In its simplest form, this trance is meant to induce a strong feeling of trust between you and your subject.$n#$b#
		Not the kind of trust you need for a trance, though. This one is more romantic in nature.$n#$b#
		With basic tools, you’ll pretty much only be able to make them like you more. It’s like giving them a gift, but without the hassle of finding out what they like.$n#$b#
		Once you get more advanced with it, however, it becomes a much more powerful tool. You can make them instantly trust you into letting you into their most private of places.$n#$b#
		And once mastered, you can manipulate their entire perception of you into being their only desire.$n#$b#
		Of course, hypnosis isn't that powerful without a price. It’ll wear off after a week or so. And they’ll probably hate you once they realize what you’ve done.$n#$b#
		They need to trust you almost completely before you can use this, but you’re still messing with someone at a very core level. It’s bound to be a shock when it wears off.$n#
MemoryLesson:
Amnesia. You know, I used this one on you a bit at our show in the Saloon.$n#$b#
		Or maybe I didn’t. Who knows? Not you, silly.$u#$b#
		This one pairs quite nicely with trying to figure out who someone is.$n#$b#
		Or trying to help them find out who they are.$u#$b#
		In its basic form, this trance allows you to make them forget very minor things.$n#$b#
		I like to use it to surprise them with several gifts a day. It’s so fun watching them get surprised at receiving the same flower every hour for a whole week.$h#$b#
		And surprisingly enough, it seems like sometimes they like it even more the second time. I guess they still somewhat remember the excitement from before and it grows.$n#$b#
		Once you get more used to this all, though, it can become more manipulative in nature.$n#$b#
		Maybe you want to start over fresh with someone whose heart you broke in pieces.$n#$b#
		Or maybe you want them to obtain a whole new personality.$u#$b#
		Once you’ve mastered this trick, the possibilities are endless.$u#$b#
		But dare to try this on me, and I’ll give you back tenfold.$a#
